name: Flood Energy For Game
description:
Hello, I`m content created is Flood Energy For Game.

Flood Energy is a new city developed due to some kind of incident.

In a city where people didn’t live due to flooding in the village.

New Flood Energy will be created throughout the village,

In the limelight as a new energy resource, the protagonist collects Flood Energy

Just escape.

This version is still an alpha version and for your testing

Version.

The rules of the game are simple, and in this PC version, it is possible to proceed with the console.

(Only play is possible, and the configurable button will be applied in the next update.)

This version, which is an alpha version of the game difficulty, is supposed to be easy to progress.

After the beta, the difficulty level will be adjusted, with BGM mode and NONBGM mode.

Separately set up a client.

It's still in a test version, so we'd love to hear your feedback.

For more information, please contact us here and we will respond kindly.

E-mali = tmdry169@Gmail.com

SNS(twitter) = @tmdry159

Thank you.
